title: True of the opportunity cost of holding cash

content.question: Which of the following is true of the opportunity cost of holding cash?

choices.label: It is represented by the value of the dollar.
It is equal to the price level.
It decreases as the price level rises.
It increases as the interest rate rises.

content.answer: It increases as the interest rate rises.

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
